Age.description: Age of the participant in years

Bedtime.description: Time participant usually goes to bed

Sleep duration.description: Average duration of sleep per day in hours

Sleep efficiency.description: Percentage of time in bed that was spent asleep

REM sleep percentage.description: Percentage of total sleep time spent in REM sleep

Deep sleep percentage.description: Percentage of total sleep time spent in deep sleep

Light sleep percentage.description: Percentage of total sleep time spent in light sleep

Awakenings.description: Average number of awakenings per night

Caffeine consumption.description: Level of caffeine consumption (scale not specified)

Alcohol consumption.description: Level of alcohol consumption (scale not specified)

Smoking status.description: Whether the participant is a smoker or not

value_dict.No: The participant is not a smoker

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in sleep science and human health.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the individual’s lifestyle and sleep habits, please predict the sleep efficiency.
